# Welcome to CSc 345: Analysis of Discrete Structures!

The course is an introduction to and analysis of algorithms and characteristics of discrete structures. Course topics include algorithm analysis techniques, recurrence relations, structural induction, hierarchical structures, graphs, hashing, and sorting.

-   D2L: [d2l](https://d2l.arizona.edu/d2l/home/1725364)
